name: An Asynchronous Server Design Framework
short_description: AMPS (Asynchronous Middleware for Protocol Servers) is a design framework for building highly scalable concurrent servers especialy suited for telecom and networking domains e.g. SIP and Diameter servers, H.323 gatekeepers, HTTP web servers etc.
